item.title: 1419: "Sleep Equity"
item.description:
No Agenda Episode 1419 - "Sleep Equity"

"Sleep Equity"

Executive Producers:

Jason Pangerl

Sir Adam of Hooverville

James Murray

Associate Executive Producers:

Amy Mullin

Abhilash Kumar

Tim Lange

Gregory DiBernardo

Jonathan Crowe

Chuck Bennett

Become a member of the 1420 Club, support the show here

Boost us with with Podcasting 2.0 Certified apps: Podfriend - Breez - Sphinx - Podstation - Curiocaster - Fountain

End of Show Mixes: Rolando Gonzalez - Tidewater Architect

Engineering, Stream Management & Wizardry

Mark van Dijk - Systems Master

Ryan Bemrose - Program Director

Chapters: Dreb Scott

item.title: 1417: "Get Boris!"
item.description:
"Get Boris!"

MLK Day Special Executive Producers:

Dame Zephyr

Sir Stephen, Viscount of the Fox River Valley and Chicago Suburbs

Sir Silent Knight

Sir Jack of the Heartland

Christopher Sullivan

Sir Stephen Visscher

Lawrence Moran

Associate Executive Producers:

Ray Grill

Sir Gray of Grimerica

Sir Dorus, Knight of The Wild Boar Mountains

Adam Naus

Become a member of the 1418 Club, support the show here

Boost us with with Podcasting 2.0 Certified apps: Podfriend - Breez - Sphinx - Podstation - Curiocaster - Fountain

Title Changes

Sir Silent Knight -> Sir Franco

Sir Stephen, Baron of the Fox River Valley -> Sir Stephen, Viscount of the Fox River Valley and Chicago Suburbs

Sir Stephen Visscher -> Baronet

Knights & Dames

Travis -> Sir Mun of the Greener Pastors

Smitty -> Sir Smitty, The Burning River Coastie

Art By: Roger Roundy

End of Show Mixes: Rolando Gonzalez

Engineering, Stream Management & Wizardry

Mark van Dijk - Systems Master

Ryan Bemrose - Program Director

Back Office Aric Mackey

Chapters: Dreb Scott

Clip Custodian: Neal Jones
